== Kozhukkallur (CT) (627391) ==

Kozhukkallur (CT) is a town in the [[Quilandy]] taluka of [[Kozhikode]] district with an area of 12.83 sq. km. and harbouring 3319 households with total population of 14007 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Kozhikode]] is at a distance of 45 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 460 km. Male population is 6570 and female population is 7437. Scheduled Caste population is 975 and Scheduled Tribes population is 36. Census Location Code of the town is 627391<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class IV (population_total 10,000 to 19,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Kozhikode (m corp. + og) at a distance of 45 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kozhikode (m corp. + og) at a distance of 45 km. Railway station is at Payyoli at a distance of 8 km.
